about_the_game:
A return to the original purpose behind MMORPGS: to create a world made of real heroes and real adventures, where your actions matter and ultimately define your character.

Key features:
  • Free to Play, with absolutely NO pay to win.
  • Coop PvE in a dynamic world that expects you to play the part of a hero, but where success is not guaranteed.
  • high skill ceiling Arena PvP.
  • A level up system that rewards you for your time and lets you stand out from other characters. Power is achieved through hard work and obstinance.
detailed_description:
A return to the original purpose behind MMORPGS: to create a world made of real heroes and real adventures, where your actions matter and ultimately define your character.

Key features:
  • Free to Play, with absolutely NO pay to win.
  • Coop PvE in a dynamic world that expects you to play the part of a hero, but where success is not guaranteed.
  • high skill ceiling Arena PvP.
  • A level up system that rewards you for your time and lets you stand out from other characters. Power is achieved through hard work and obstinance.
name: Ninja Bricks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 or AMD A10 5700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7750 (1GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Ninja Bricks is an action MMORPG where you can cooperate with other players to defend the brick world, participate in PvP arenas full of bullet hell warfare, all while enjoying dashing and cute graphics, along with a character development system that deeply rewards you for your invested time.
